title: Best ‘Wicked’ Merch: 16 Wickedly Good Collaborations to Shop Before the Film Hits Theaters
description: From Wicked-themed tech to shoes, bags, beauty essentials and other magical goodies to help you channel the energy of Wicked.
author: Latifah Muhammad
excerpt: From tech to beauty and other magical goodies, here's a list of the best 'Wicked' merch to shop right now.
text: Skip to main content From Wicked-themed tech to shoes, bags, beauty essentials and other magical goodies to help you channel the energy of Wicked. Universal Pictures All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. Countdown to Wicked! Ariana Grande will make her debut as Glinda the Good Witch alongside Oscar winner Cynthia Erivo as Elphaba, Wicked Witch of the West, in the eagerly anticipated film out Nov. 22. With just four weeks until it hits theaters, Wicked fans are readying a journey to the Land of Oz. To help prepare for the trip, we’ve collected a list of the cutest Wicked-themed merchandise to shop before (and after) the film drops. From headphones and speakers to sweatshirts, shoes, luggage, beauty essentials and other goodies, see below for a collection of merch that’ll help you channel the magical energy of Wicked. Trending on Billboard Target Wicked Elphaba Bluetooth Wireless Headphones Wicked headphones for the kiddies! These Elphaba headphones (available exclusively at Target) offer 37 hours of playtime and Wicked design elements. Shark Wicked x Shark FlexStyle Limited-Edition Magical mane! The Wicked x Shark FlexStyle comes in an ombre green colorway with a hit of pink. The Shark FlexStyle is a multi-use hair tool that is designed to curl, smooth, dry and volumize. Aldo Wicked x Aldo Spellbinding Strappy Sandals Ready for a night out in the Emerald City? The Aldo x Wicked collection features sparkling heels, pumps and accessories. Grande wore custom, pink Aldo pumps inspired by the collection while hosting SNL earlier this month. Vera Bradley Vera Bradley x Wicked Large Original Duffel Vera Bradley’s Wicked collection features this lovely duffle bag (available in pink or green). The roomy bag is sized just right for traveling, or hitting the gym. Beis  Béis The Carry-On Roller in Wicked Green Whether your traveling to Emerald City or another destination, the Wicked x Béis collection will get you there in style. The limited collection includes suitcases, backpacks and more. Amazon OPI x Wicked Limited Edition Collection, 2PC Duo-Pack Give your nails a touch of Wicked. This duo set from Opi’s Wicked collection pairs bright pink and dark green gel polish. Aerie Aerie x Wicked Big Chill Crew Sweatshirt Cozying up in Emerald City? Get comfy in the Aerie x Wicked Big Chill Crew Sweatshirt (available in smoked gray and light heather gray). Bombas Wicked x Bombas Lightweight Quarter Sock, 4-Pack Bombas’ Wicked collection features 12 sock styles inspired by Elphaba and Glinda. Kim Kardashian slipped into a pair of socks from the collection to host a private, Wicked screening at her house on Tuesday. Voluspa Wicked x Voluspa Pink Goes With Green Candle Duo Set Light things up with this candle set from the Wicked x Voluspa collab. The candle coupling features 8.5oz candles: Elphaba’s Bewitching Banyan Forest and Glinda’s Perfectly Pink Yuzu. Target Wicked Lego Emerald City Build your very own Emerald City! The Welcome to the Emerald City Lego Set has 945 piece and Lego minis of Glinda, Elphaba, The Wizard, Madame Morrible and Fiyero. Mattel Wicked Elphaba Singing Doll With the press of a button, Mattel’s singing Elphaba doll belts out “Defying Grafity.” Shop more Wicked dolls here. Walmart Wicked Glinda at Shiz University Doll Head of the class! The Glinda at Shiz University doll is ready for school with her pink school bag and Shiz textbooks. Amazon Monopoly Wicked Edition Board Game | Inspired by The Motion Picture | Play a Wicked round of Monopoly with this movie-themed board game. It comes complete with munchkin homes, emerald castles, Defy Gravity and Total Ozmopolitan cards and six tokens: Elphaba’s hat, Elphaba’s Broom, Elphaba’s Bottle, Glinda’s Crown, Glinda’s Trunks, and The Grimmerie. Target Bitty Boomer Glinda & Elphaba Speakers (Sold Separately) A mini speaker with a Wicked vibe. The Bitty Boomers Elphaba Speaker and Glinda Speaker are a couple of the exclusive drops that you’ll find at Target. Bitty Boomers features Bluetooth 5.0 and up to four hours of playtime. Want more ways to celebrate Wicked? Toast to Oz with a Wicked-themed cocktail kit ($160) from Cocktail Courier. It’s packed with all the ingredients (and booze) needed for Oz-inspired drinks such as “Popular Pink Punch,” “Ozmopolitan” and the “Ozpresso Martini.” There’s also a Wicked-inspired hotel suite at the Hilton New York Midtown. The custom-designed suite will be available from Nov. 21 until Jan. 5 (book here). Speaking of the Big Apple, Wicked the musical opened on Broadway in 2013 and went on to gross over $1 billion. In 2017, Wicked became the second-highest grossing Broadway musical in history behind The Lion King. Will the movie be just as popular as the Broadway production? The film has already earned strong numbers in presale tickets and could rake in as much as $150 million opening weekend, per Box Office Theory. The Universal Pictures’ fantasy film, directed by Jon M. Chu, is estimated to make as much as $1 billion at the box office. Get weekly rundowns straight to your inbox Sign Up
html:
Skip to main content

From Wicked-themed tech to shoes, bags, beauty essentials and other magical goodies to help you channel the energy of Wicked.

All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes.

Countdown to Wicked! Ariana Grande will make her debut as Glinda the Good Witch alongside Oscar winner Cynthia Erivo as Elphaba, Wicked Witch of the West, in the eagerly anticipated film out Nov. 22.

With just four weeks until it hits theaters, Wicked fans are readying a journey to the Land of Oz. To help prepare for the trip, we’ve collected a list of the cutest Wicked-themed merchandise to shop before (and after) the film drops.

From headphones and speakers to sweatshirts, shoes, luggage, beauty essentials and other goodies, see below for a collection of merch that’ll help you channel the magical energy of Wicked.

Trending on Billboard

Wicked Elphaba Bluetooth Wireless Headphones

Wicked headphones for the kiddies! These Elphaba headphones (available exclusively at Target) offer 37 hours of playtime and Wicked design elements.

Wicked x Shark FlexStyle Limited-Edition

Magical mane! The Wicked x Shark FlexStyle comes in an ombre green colorway with a hit of pink. The Shark FlexStyle is a multi-use hair tool that is designed to curl, smooth, dry and volumize.

Wicked x Aldo Spellbinding Strappy Sandals

Ready for a night out in the Emerald City? The Aldo x Wicked collection features sparkling heels, pumps and accessories. Grande wore custom, pink Aldo pumps inspired by the collection while hosting SNL earlier this month.

Vera Bradley x Wicked Large Original Duffel

Vera Bradley’s Wicked collection features this lovely duffle bag (available in pink or green). The roomy bag is sized just right for traveling, or hitting the gym.

 Béis The Carry-On Roller in Wicked Green

Whether your traveling to Emerald City or another destination, the Wicked x Béis collection will get you there in style. The limited collection includes suitcases, backpacks and more.

OPI x Wicked Limited Edition Collection, 2PC Duo-Pack

Give your nails a touch of Wicked. This duo set from Opi’s Wicked collection pairs bright pink and dark green gel polish.

Aerie x Wicked Big Chill Crew Sweatshirt

Cozying up in Emerald City? Get comfy in the Aerie x Wicked Big Chill Crew Sweatshirt (available in smoked gray and light heather gray).

Wicked x Bombas Lightweight Quarter Sock, 4-Pack

Bombas’ Wicked collection features 12 sock styles inspired by Elphaba and Glinda. Kim Kardashian slipped into a pair of socks from the collection to host a private, Wicked screening at her house on Tuesday.

Wicked x Voluspa Pink Goes With Green Candle Duo Set

Light things up with this candle set from the Wicked x Voluspa collab. The candle coupling features 8.5oz candles: Elphaba’s Bewitching Banyan Forest and Glinda’s Perfectly Pink Yuzu.

Wicked Lego Emerald City

Build your very own Emerald City! The Welcome to the Emerald City Lego Set has 945 piece and Lego minis of Glinda, Elphaba, The Wizard, Madame Morrible and Fiyero.

Wicked Elphaba Singing Doll

With the press of a button, Mattel’s singing Elphaba doll belts out “Defying Grafity.” Shop more Wicked dolls here.

Wicked Glinda at Shiz University Doll

Head of the class! The Glinda at Shiz University doll is ready for school with her pink school bag and Shiz textbooks.

Monopoly Wicked Edition Board Game | Inspired by The Motion Picture |

Play a Wicked round of Monopoly with this movie-themed board game. It comes complete with munchkin homes, emerald castles, Defy Gravity and Total Ozmopolitan cards and six tokens: Elphaba’s hat, Elphaba’s Broom, Elphaba’s Bottle, Glinda’s Crown, Glinda’s Trunks, and The Grimmerie.

Bitty Boomer Glinda & Elphaba Speakers (Sold Separately)

A mini speaker with a Wicked vibe. The Bitty Boomers Elphaba Speaker and Glinda Speaker are a couple of the exclusive drops that you’ll find at Target. Bitty Boomers features Bluetooth 5.0 and up to four hours of playtime.

Want more ways to celebrate Wicked? Toast to Oz with a Wicked-themed cocktail kit ($160) from Cocktail Courier. It’s packed with all the ingredients (and booze) needed for Oz-inspired drinks such as “Popular Pink Punch,” “Ozmopolitan” and the “Ozpresso Martini.”

There’s also a Wicked-inspired hotel suite at the Hilton New York Midtown. The custom-designed suite will be available from Nov. 21 until Jan. 5 (book here).

Speaking of the Big Apple, Wicked the musical opened on Broadway in 2013 and went on to gross over $1 billion. In 2017, Wicked became the second-highest grossing Broadway musical in history behind The Lion King.

Will the movie be just as popular as the Broadway production? The film has already earned strong numbers in presale tickets and could rake in as much as $150 million opening weekend, per Box Office Theory. The Universal Pictures’ fantasy film, directed by Jon M. Chu, is estimated to make as much as $1 billion at the box office.
